channel.title: nvm on Book
channel.description: Recent content in nvm on Book

item.title: Windows
item.description: Windows Install Desistalar npm si lo tienes instalado. https://github.com/coreybutler/nvm-windows/releases Descargar nvm-setup.zip, de la vercion que quieras Basic execute command nvm list available from cmd or gitbash or powershell, this will list all available version of node nvm list available use command nvm install version e.g. nvm install 12.14.0 to install on the machine nvm install version e.g. nvm install 12.14.0 o nvm install lts o nvm install latest last once installed use nvm use version to use newer version e.
